member.name: M:TicTacToeUltimate.MauiProgram.ProbeCandidates(System.String[],Microsoft.Extensions.Logging.ILogger)
member.summary: Tries each URL in by calling GET /ping and returns the first base that responds with "pong". Falls back to the first URL if none respond (so the app still boots and logs an error).

member.name: T:TicTacToeUltimate.Resource
member.summary: Android Resource Designer class. Exposes the Android Resource designer assembly into the project Namespace.
